fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Zap**: Once per night, you can target a player, electrifying them. If the player is visited by any roles with night abilities, their actions will fail and they will be dealt a Basic attack.
- **Overcharge**: Once per game, during the day, you can choose to overcharge yourself. While overcharged, you become immune to all forms of control and negative effects. However, you cannot perform any actions or use your abilities during this time. The overcharge will automatically wear off at the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, Sparky's **Zap** ability is empowered, allowing it to bypass even the most powerful defenses and deal a Powerful attack to the target.
- **Lightning Rod**: Whenever a player tries to perform a harmful action against a member of the Brainless faction, there is a 25% chance that the action will be redirected to Sparky instead.
- **Unpredictable Wiring**: At the start of the game, Sparky will receive a random ability from another Brainless role, which can be used in addition to their own abilities.
